title: [The Mother Lode, Bedroom]
description: Moonight from the window filters through the sheer red curtains, silhouetting a katana balanced on its edge on the sill.  A thick down comforter covers the low bed.  A pine table is on the opposite side of the bed, while a simple pine wardrobe is on the near side.
